name: Sol

active_effects.name: Weapon Mastery
active_effects.description: Mastery of weapons increases combat effectiveness.

active_effects.name: Blade Affinity
active_effects.description: Natural affinity for blades enhances weapon techniques.

appearance_summary: Sol is a well-built weapon master with sharp, focused eyes and calloused hands from years of weapon training. He moves with fluid grace and carries himself with the confidence of a seasoned warrior. His weapons are always within easy reach and perfectly maintained.
backstory_summary: Born with natural talent for weapons, Sol dedicated himself to mastering all forms of combat and weapon summoning. He became a key member of Konoha's Combat Division, specializing in kenjutsu and weapon techniques. His ability to summon and control weapons has made him a formidable opponent in battle.
personality_summary: Sol is a skilled and aggressive combat specialist who approaches battle with precision and determination. He's focused and disciplined, using his weapon mastery to dominate opponents in close combat. His dedication to his craft makes him both dangerous and reliable in battle.
combat_directives: Use weapon summoning to control the battlefield and overwhelm opponents. Use kenjutsu techniques for precise, deadly strikes. Prioritize close combat and weapon mastery. Use blade techniques to cut through enemy defenses. Maintain weapon advantage through constant summoning and control.
